com.example.jacob.mybrary

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.jacob.mybrary.Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Victoria. Model class that represents the book class. Can create new books, add comments, and get and set book attributes. The toString() method dictates what will be displayed in the inventory activity.
